start.text: You're all about to have a real bad day!

retreat.text: That there is just a sad display, boy.

engaged.text: You're in a big fat hurry to die, son.
You done incurred my wrath, son.

pursuing.text: This thing ain't on auto-pilot, son!
Not fast enough; not by a damn sight.
Outta mah way!  Outta mah way!

running.text: Hell boys, we better man up in a big damn hurry.

hull_90.text: Come on boys!  These Yankees are all hat and no battle!
I'm done playin' games with you, boy.

hull_50.text: This is *not* doing my spine any favors!

hull_30.text: Guess it's up to me now.

overload.text: Do I look like a mule, boys?  I can't carry this whole dang fleet!

death.text: That there is just a sad display, boy.

victory.text: That there was a fine piece of work.

victory_boss.text: If ya done it, it ain't braggin'!
Son, I never said this to anybody before, but I am *damn* proud of you!
